ValidMind API

Version: 1.0

Security

Bearer Auth

apiKey API Key
In header
Name Authorization
Description Example: Bearer eyXXXXXXXX (for now login in postman and paste the token here)

oauth2

oauth2 OAuth 2.0
Flow implicit
Authorization URL https://dev-bpojk7up.us.auth0.com/authorize?audience=https://api.test.vm.validmind.ai
Scopes
openid Grants openid access
profile Grants profile access
email Grants email access

groups

Groups related operations

/api/v1/groups

GET

Summary

Retrieve a paginated list of groups from the logged-in user’s organization

Description

Fetch a paginated list of groups from the logged-in user’s organization. Query Parameters:

  • page: Page number for pagination (default is 1).
  • limit: Limit the number of items to be returned (default is 100).
  • sort_by: Sort by one of the available fields: ‘name’, ‘created_at’, ‘updated_at’ (default is ‘name’). # noqa
  • sort_order: Sort order, either ‘asc’ or ‘desc’ (default is ‘asc’).
  • search: Search term for groups, uses ILIKE on ‘name’.
  • is_default: Filter by default groups (true or false).
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
page query Page number No integer
limit query Limit the number of items No integer
sort_by query Sort by this field No string
sort_order query Sort order No string
search query Search term using ILIKE on name No string
is_default query Is default group? No boolean
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Successful retrieval of group list. PaginatedGroups
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Create a new group in the logged user’s organization

Description

Create a new group in the logged user’s organization.

  • Validates name is unique.

Request Payload:

  • name: (required) The name of the group.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes PostGroup
Responses
Code Description
201 User successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing name in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/groups/{cuid}

GET

Summary

Retrieve a specific group from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Retrieve a specific group by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Success.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 User not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

PATCH

Summary

Update specific group details in the logged user’s organization

Description

Update a specific group by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

  • Validates name is unique.

Request Payload:

  • name: (optional) New name of the group.

Partial updates are allowed.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
payload body Yes PatchGroup
Responses
Code Description
200 Group updated successfully.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing or invalid fields in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

DELETE

Summary

Delete a specific group from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Delete a specific group by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

  • Removes all memberships
  • Removes all references it’s the resources:
    • inventory models
    • templates
    • workflows
  • And sets it to the organization’s default group.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Group deleted successfully.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/groups/{cuid}/resources

GET

Summary

Get group resources by type

Description

Retrieves the resources in the group. Query Parameters:

  • type: (required) The type of the cuids of resources.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
type query Resource type Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Successful retrieval of linked resources.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

DELETE

Summary

Remove the resources from the group

Description

Removes the resource from the group. Returns an array of resource cuids that were removed.

Request Payload:

  • type: (required) The type of the cuids of resources
  • resources: (required) List of resource cuids.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
payload body Yes GroupResource
Responses
Code Description
200 Successful removal of group resource.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing or invalid fields in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.
